Kashira:
Kuchiaki Bunshichi (口あき文七)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Color Prints of Kagamiyama (Kagamiyama kokyō no nishikie / 加賀見山旧錦絵)

The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (Honchō nijūshikō / 本朝廿四孝)

Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (Sugawara denju tenarai kagami / 菅原伝授手習鑑)

The Nunobiki Waterfall (Genpei Nunobiki no taki / 源平布引滝)

The Teachings for Women (Imoseyama onna teikin / 妹背山婦女庭訓)

The Adachi Plain in Oshu (Ōshu Adachigahara / 奥州安達原)

The Nine-Tailed Fox (Tamamo no mae asahi no tamoto / 玉藻前曦袂)

The Battle of Ichinotani (Ichinotani futaba gunki / 一谷嫩軍記)

The White Fox of Shinoda (Ashiya Dōman ōuchi kagami / 芦屋道満大内鑑)

The Trouble in the Date Household (Meiboku sendaihagi / 伽羅先代萩)

The New Usuyuki Story (Shin usuyuki monogatari / 新薄雪物語)

Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees (Yoshitsune senbonzakura / 義経千本桜)

Mt. Oeyama (Ōeyama shutendōji / 大江山酒呑童子)

Pilgrimage to the West (Saiyūki / 西遊記)

The Ridge Pole of the Sanjusangendo Temple (Sanjūsangendō munagi no yurai / 三十三間堂棟由来)
